Package cycling

Class Checkpoint

java.lang.Object
cycling.Checkpoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Checkpoint extends Object implements Serializable
Checkpoint class. This class manages all the checkpoints within CyclingPortal and the times and ranks that rider's got inside of the checkpoints.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Checkpoint

      public Checkpoint(int stageId, Double location, CheckpointType type, Double length, Double averageGradient)
      The first constructor method for this class, instantiates and initialises all the non-static variables.

      Assigns each of then non-static variables values when all the details about the checkpoint has been specified.

      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage.
      location - The location of the stage.
      type - The type of stage.
      length - The length of the stage.
      averageGradient - The average gradient of the stage.

    • Checkpoint

      public Checkpoint(int stageId, Double location)
      The second constructor method for this class, instantiates and initialises all the non-static variables.

      Only assigns some of the variables values when the type, lenght and average gradient have not been specified.

      Parameters:
      stageId - The ID of the stage.
      location - The location of the stage.

      public int[] getIntermediateSprintPoints()
      GETTER method for the array of points given to the rider's each based on their respective position that they achieved in the intermediate sprint.
      Returns:
      The array of integers of the respective points for each of the riders based on their position.

    • getRiderCompletionTimes

      public LocalTime getRiderCompletionTimes(int riderId)
      Method that retrieves the completion/finish time of a rider for the checkpoint.
      Parameters:
      riderId - The ID of the rider who completed the checkpoint.
      Returns:
      The finish time that the rider achieved from racing in the checkpoint.

    • addCompletionTime

      public void addCompletionTime(int riderId, LocalTime completeTime)
      Method that adds and stores the rider ID and the finish time that the rider got for the checkpoint in a HashMap.
      Parameters:
      riderId - The ID of the rider, who finished the checkpoint.
      completeTime - The finish time that the rider got for the checkpoint.

    • deleteCompletionTime

      public void deleteCompletionTime(int riderId)
      Method that deletes a rider's finish time from the HashMap of finish times.
      Parameters:
      riderId - The ID of the rider that is going to be removed.

    • calculateRidersRankInCheckpoints

      public int[] calculateRidersRankInCheckpoints()
      Method that calculates all the riders' ranks that they achieved in the checkpoint by the finish times that they achieved during the race, sorted with the winner (fastest time) being the first in the array.
      Returns:
      An array of all the rider IDs, sorted based on the finish time they achieved in the checkpoint.

    • atomicReset

      public static void atomicReset()
      Method that resets the ID counter. The ID counter creates a new ID for every single new rider that is created.
